Body:
with mock.patch('displayarray.frame.frame_publishing.threading.Thread',
    new_callable=mock.MagicMock) as mock_thread:
    thread_instance = mock_thread.return_value = mock.MagicMock()
    pub_cam_thread(5)
    mock_thread.assert_called_once_with(target=fpub.pub_cam_loop_opencv,
        args=(5, (-1, -1), True, float('inf')))
    thread_instance.start.assert_called_once()
